sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
a reminder of another thing
, ob tem pomislimo na tisto drugo stvar.

seg.quote: Seeing her again was a painful reminder of how different things had been five years ago.

sense.def:
A reminder
je tudi pismo, s katerim nas kdo opomni, da nismo na primer plačali računa ali vrnili knjige v knjižnico.
